entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -30.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
